markdownRemark.html:
Project URL

Problem

  • Q: Why do I need a trust when I can make a CPF nomination for my CPF savings?

A: The CPF nomination specifies the persons who will receive your CPF savings and how much each nominee would receive upon your demise. A trust expands the options, to further address other concerns, such as deferring and staggering the pay-outto the nominees should you deem them financially immature or vulnerable because of young or elder age.

Solution

Stack

  • Programming Languages: Typescript
  • Frontend: Quasar(Vue), VueX
  • Testing: Cypress for automated end-to-end testing
  • Misc: Axios
